column2: Become Favoured by [Root.Offmap.GetName]
By investing a large amount of §YArdor§!, I can persuade [Root.Offmap.GetName] to continue to look upon me favourably, even if I am no longer directly worshipping them.
Is NOT Dragon-Blooded §g(Dragon-Blooded characters are favoured by default)§!
Is NOT already §YFavoured by [Prev.Offmap.GetName]§!
Owns one of [Prev.Offmap.GetName]'s artifacts
Is §YFavoured by Azura§! - either because [This.GetSheHe] worships them in secret, or simply due to the inscrutable whims of the Daedric Lord
